name: Pocket Planet (Event Horizon Studios)
description:
Pocket planet is a simple puzzle game where you can place tiles on a hexagonal grid.

Tiles differ in shapes and colors; place trees to create hills, rocks to create mountains, sand to create deserts, and much more!

Every level will require you to create different beautiful environments, get a star for every objective completed!

Try to get all the stars on every level!

[This project is still in development]
